name: Snuffed Out
description:
Snuffed Out puts the player into the role of a thief, sneaking their way through a castle full of traps, enemies and treasure. Only a few light sources like candles, magic staffs and torches illuminate the area, which turns every corner into a pitch-black spot of uncertainty with potential loot to grab for those who dare to explore. Equipped with just a torch, the player must find as much gold as possible while avoiding the light to not get seen and still maneuver through the darkness safely. Use your surroundings and listen closely to spot potential secrets or stealthy enemies hiding where you won’t expect it!

Keyboard Controls

Movement - WASD

Camera - Mouse

Sprint - Shift

Crouch - Ctrl

Jump - Space

Torch - E

Interact - LMB

Gamepad Controls

Movement - Left stick

Camera - Right stick

Sprint - Left or right trigger

Crouch - L3

Jump - A

Torch - B

Interact - X

Credits
